name: @oh-my-pi/pi-coding-agent
description: Coding agent CLI with read, bash, edit, write tools and session management

scripts.build: tsgo -p tsconfig.build.json && chmod +x dist/cli.js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:binary: npm run build && bun build --compile ./dist/cli.js --outfile dist/pi && npm run copy-binary-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/modes/interactive/theme && cp src/modes/interactive/theme/*.json dist/modes/interactive/theme/ && mkdir -p dist/core/export-html && cp src/core/export-html/template.html src/core/export-html/template.css src/core/export-html/template.js dist/core/export-html/ && mkdir -p dist/core/tools/task/bundled-agents && cp src/core/tools/task/bundled-agents/*.md dist/core/tools/task/bundled-agents/
scripts.copy-binary-assets: cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/ && mkdir -p dist/theme && cp src/modes/interactive/theme/*.json dist/theme/ && mkdir -p dist/export-html && cp src/core/export-html/template.html src/core/export-html/template.css src/core/export-html/template.js dist/export-html/ && cp -r docs dist/ && cp -r examples dist/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Mario Zechner
